talents.description: May choose to remove SETB or gain BOOS on Investigation checks per ranks of Keen Eye.
Gain +1 strain threshold.
Choose any 2 skills. They permanently become class skills.
Gain +2 wound threshold.
May remove SETB applied to Knowledge checks made to research per ranks of Researcher. Time taken to perform research is reduced by 50% (this bonus does not stack).
Allies within close range add BOOS to Perception or Vigilance checks. Engaged allies add BOOSBOOS.
When healing strain after an encounter, heal 1 additional strain per rank of Rapid Recovery.
When a character suffers strain they suffer 1 less to a minimum of one. This does not apply to voluntary strain gain.
May choose to remove SETB or gain BOOS on Investigation checks per ranks of Keen Eye.
Gain +1 strain threshold.
Do not suffer usual penalties for moving through difficult terrain.
When targeted by combat check, may perform a Dodge incidental to suffer a number of strain no greater than ranks of Dodge, then upgrade the difficulty of the check by that number.
Once per session, take the Diamond in the Rough action. Make a Hard (DIFFDIFFDIFF) Knowledge or Investigation check to learn a new detail about a previously discovered relic, ruin, or treasure.
Once per session, may perform a Familiar Sky maneuver; make a Hard (DIFFDIFFDIFF) Knowledge or Survival check to reveal details about the current environment and other useful information.
When targeted by combat check, may perform a Dodge incidental to suffer a number of strain no greater than ranks of Dodge, then upgrade the difficulty of the check by that number.
When healing strain after an encounter, heal 1 additional strain per rank of Rapid Recovery.
Once per session, may re-roll any 1 Perception or Investigation check once.
Once per session, take Museum Worthy action, make a Hard(DIFFDIFFDIFF) Knowledge check to learn new information about a relic, ruin, or piece of history.
Gain +ya1 to a single characteristic. This cannot bring a characteristic above 6.
After hitting with combat check, may spend ADVTADVT to disorient target for number of rounds equal to ranks in Disorient.
